decks.notes: The deck focuses on aggressive play using a combination of powerful creatures like Sheoldred and Steel Seraph, alongside removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down to control the board. Insatiable Avarice provides card draw, while Shrouded Shepherd and Tenacious Underdog offer support and resilience. The deck also includes cards like Shadow of Mortality for added pressure. With a mix of efficiency, resilience, and strong creatures, this Aggro Orzhov deck aims to apply constant pressure on opponents and overwhelm them with its aggressive strategy.

This Esper Aggro deck focuses on using a combination of creature removal spells, powerful creatures like The Wandering Emperor and Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal, and synergy between creatures and spells like Raffine, Scheming Seer and Wedding Announcement to quickly overwhelm the opponent and maintain board control. The deck also includes lands that provide a variety of colors to ensure consistency in casting spells and activating abilities. By utilizing a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent and secure victory through a combination of aggression and control.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By combining efficient removal like Go for the Throat with evasive threats like Spyglass Siren and Deep-Cavern Bat, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage quickly. Key cards like Tinybones, the Pickpocket and Preacher of the Schism help to disrupt opponents' strategies and gain card advantage. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Ertai Resurrected provide additional late-game threats to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to establish control over the game through a combination of counter spells, removal, and card draw. By utilizing cards like No More Lies, Restless Anchorage, and Memory Deluge, the player aims to disrupt their opponent's strategy while gaining card advantage. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Disruption Protocol and Temporary Lockdown to further hinder the opponent's game plan. In addition, cards like Jace, the Perfected Mind and Sunfall provide additional control tools and win conditions. Ultimately, the goal is to outmaneuver the opponent and secure victory through superior card advantage and control.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize control elements to slow down the opponent's strategy while building up resources and ramping into powerful creatures. The deck focuses on using cards like Leyline Binding and Depopulate to disrupt the opponent, while also utilizing ramp cards like Up the Beanstalk and Herd Migration to accelerate into big threats like Archangel of Wrath and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck aims to establish board control and overwhelm the opponent with big creatures, ultimately leading to victory.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a combination of spells and creatures to disrupt the opponent's strategy and gain advantage. With a mix of card draw, removal, and powerful creatures like Nissa and Shigeki, the deck aims to outlast and outvalue opponents in a grindy game. By generating card advantage through Brokers Hideout and Memory Deluge, as well as managing the board with Ill-Timed Explosion and Virtue of Strength, the deck looks to establish a dominant position and close out the game with lethal threats like Fires of Victory and Worldsoul's Rage.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and removal spells to control the board and deal damage to the opponent quickly. The key strategy is to maintain board presence with a variety of creatures with different abilities, while using removal spells to clear the way for attacks. The deck includes a mix of powerful legendary creatures and lands to provide additional benefits and options for the player. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient aggro strategy.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, aiming to quickly deal damage to the opponent and overwhelm them before they have a chance to respond. With a mix of direct damage spells, powerful creatures, and haste granting cards, the deck looks to close out the game as soon as possible. By utilizing a strong mana base and a variety of efficient threats, the deck seeks to maintain pressure throughout the game and secure victory through rapid and relentless assault.
